text: Dhritarashtra said: O Sanjaya, after gathering on the sacred field of Kurukshetra...
translation: Dhritarashtra said: O Sanjaya, what did my sons and the sons of Pandu do...

text: You have a right to perform your prescribed duties, but you are not entitled to the fruits of your actions.
translation: Perform your duty, but do not concern yourself with the results.
